item.title: 花旗、汇丰命令更多员工每周五天在办公室工作
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）和汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）正在命令更多的美国员工每周五天到公司办公室报到，因为监管的变化使得华尔街允许在家办公变得更加棘手。【原文：Citigroup Inc. and HSBC Holdings Plc are ordering more US staffers to report to company offices five days a week as regulatory changes make it trickier for Wall Street to allow working from home.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团大股东支持矿商对必和必拓谈判的立场
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的几位大股东表示，他们支持该公司在接受任何收购提议之前，努力说服必和必拓集团改变其收购提议的结构，或对其带来的风险进行补偿。【原文：Several of Anglo American Plc’s big shareholders say they support the company’s efforts to persuade BHP Group to change the structure of its takeover proposal or compensate for the risks it presents, before accepting any offer.】

item.title: 全球经济双速增长，通胀消退不均，七国集团焦虑不安
item.description: 在本周举行的七国集团会议上，官员们正面临着货币政策同步性降低的前景，美国的强势导致全球经济双速发展，为会议蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：A two-speed global economy skewed by US strength is overshadowing this week’s Group of Seven meeting as officials confront the prospect of less synchronized monetary policies.】

item.title: 特斯拉在裁员数周后发布人工智能和自动驾驶汽车的招聘信息
item.description: 特斯拉公司发布了十几个自动驾驶和人工智能职位，这是该公司在连续数周裁员后首次出现员工增长迹象。【原文：Tesla Inc. has posted more than a dozen Autopilot and artificial intelligence positions, its first sign of workforce growth after weeks of rolling layoffs.】

item.title: 大众称削减成本而非关税将保护欧洲免受中国电动汽车的影响
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）表示，欧盟对中国生产的电动汽车征收更高的进口关税只会带来短暂的喘息机会，从长远来看，降低成本是保持竞争力的必要条件。【原文：Volkswagen AG said higher import tariffs for Chinese-made EVs in the European Union will offer only a short respite, with lower costs necessary to stay competitive over the long run.】

item.title: 污水检测显示禽流感在奶牛中更为普遍
item.description: 密歇根州一名农场工人的禽流感检测呈阳性，这是自三月份美国牛群中爆发禽流感以来第二名感染者。对污水的监测表明，这种病毒在奶牛中的传播可能比报告的更广泛，从而增加了工人感染的风险。【原文：A Michigan farmworker who tested positive for bird flu is just the second person to have been infected since an outbreak in US cattle appeared in March. item.description: 哈格里夫斯-兰斯当公司（Hargreaves Lansdown Plc）决定拒绝一组投资者的收购要约，这使英国财富管理公司成为焦点，因为周四伦敦一些同行的股价出现上涨。【原文：Hargreaves Lansdown Plc’s decision to reject a takeover offer from a group of investors is putting British wealth managers in the spotlight as shares of some of its peers rallied on Thursday in London.】

item.description: 在过去半个世纪的大部分时间里，作为一种买入并持有的投资方式，美国国债的收益率一直遥遥领先于黄金。现在，债券作为最终避风港的地位正面临着最大的挑战之一。【原文：For much of the past half century, US Treasuries have handily outpaced gold as a buy-and-hold investment. Now, bonds’ status as the ultimate haven is facing one of its biggest challenges yet.】

item.title: 戈尔曼将于年底卸任摩根士丹利董事长一职
item.description: 詹姆斯-戈尔曼（James Gorman）将于年底卸任摩根士丹利董事长一职，他在摩根士丹利近二十年的经营中，将公司从失败的边缘拯救出来，并将其打造成财富管理巨头。【原文：James Gorman will cede his role as Morgan Stanley chairman at year-end, capping a nearly two-decade run at the firm in which he rescued it from the brink of failure and turned it into a wealth-management powerhouse.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司肯布尔债务谈判陷入僵局，英国投票呼之欲出
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在英国首相苏纳克（Rishi Sunak）宣布大选之后，泰晤士水务有限公司（Thames Water Ltd. ）母公司与其债权人之间的谈判实际上已经冻结。【原文：Talks between Thames Water Ltd.’s parent company and its creditors are effectively frozen after UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak called a general election, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦与国际货币基金组织关于新贷款的初步会谈将于 5 月 24 日结束：官员
item.description: 在双方官员讨论了即将到来的预算提案之后，巴基斯坦和国际货币基金组织将于明天结束为期两周的新贷款初步谈判。【原文：Pakistan and the International Monetary Fund will end two weeks of initial talks for a new loan tomorrow after the officials from the two sides discussed proposals for the upcoming budget.】

item.title: 陷入困境的 Segantii 可在五天内退出 97% 的投资组合
item.description: 西蒙-萨德勒（Simon Sadler）的塞甘蒂资本管理公司（Segantii Capital Management）因内幕交易指控于周四突然决定向投资者返还资本，该公司可以在五个交易日内清算绝大部分赌注。【原文：Simon Sadler’s Segantii Capital Management, which abruptly decided to return capital to investors on Thursday amid an insider trading charge, can liquidate the vast majority of its bets within five trading days.】

item.title: 波兰炼油企业 Orlen 因新任首席执行官 Fafara 未能说服投资者接受其愿景而暴跌
item.description: 波兰最大的能源公司创下六个月来最大跌幅，因为投资者希望新的管理团队在第一季度盈利未达预期后明确支出情况。【原文：Poland’s largest energy company slumped the most in six months as investors sought clarity from the new management team about spending after first-quarter earnings missed estimates.】
